parameter.name: userIds
parameter.description: Integer. Comma separated string of one or more user ids.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: String. Refers to the jobcode type - regular, pto, or all. Defaults to regular.

parameter.name: jobcodeParentId
parameter.description: Integer. When omitted, all jobcode assignments are returned regardless of jobcode parent.

parameter.name: active
parameter.description: String. yes, no, or both. Default is both. Yes means the assignment is active, no means it is deleted/inactive.

parameter.name: modifiedBefore
parameter.description: String (ISO8601 format). Only jobcode assignments modified before this date/time will be returned (i.e. 2004-02-12T15:19:21+00:00).

parameter.name: modifiedSince
parameter.description: String (ISO8601 format). Only jobcode assignments modified since this date/time will be returned (i.e. 2004-02-12T15:19:21+00:00).

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: Integer. Represents how many results like to retrieve per request (page). Default is 50. Max is 50.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Integer. Represents the page of results like to retrieve.
